thread.title: Beloved California Destination Named 'Richest County' In The Entire State
thread.title_full: Beloved California Destination Named 'Richest County' In The Entire State

author: @iHeartRadio
title: Beloved California Destination Named 'Richest County' In The Entire State
text:
Beloved California Destination Named 'Richest County' In The Entire State
By Logan DeLoye
January 9, 2025
Do you live in the richest county in all of California?
This area, known for housing some of the wealthiest residents and most extravagant properties in the state, is known for being the richest region around. The median household income in the county we're going to discuss in this article is substantially higher than other California counties, and it also houses a few large cities and familiar locations.
According to a list compiled by [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/richest-county-every-state-130018954.html), the richest county [in California](https://www.iheart.com/content/2025-01-08-popular-california-restaurant-serves-the-best-cheeseburger-in-the-state/) is Santa Clara. Santa Clara County houses San Jose and Santa Clara, and its median household income is $140,258.
Here's what Yahoo Finance had to say about compiling the data to discover the richest county in the entire state:
"The following numbers are based on the U.S. Census Bureau’s American Community Survey for 2021, the most recent available. Our list counts down by state, lowest numbers to highest. We’ve also included each county’s largest cities and/or towns by population, based on U.S. Census data. For some additional perspective while you browse, keep in mind that the real median income across the U.S. in 2021 was $70,784, according to the United States Census Bureau. That was down slightly from the 2020 figure: $71,186."
For a [continued list](https://www.iheart.com/content/2024-12-31-nostalgic-california-eatery-serves-the-best-soup-in-the-entire-state/) of the richest counties across the country check out [finance.yahoo.com](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/richest-county-every-state-130018954.html).
